home.welcome: Welcome to Thammenha, Your Personal Used Car Price Estimator!
home.description: Easily estimate your car's value with just a few clicks! Input key details and let our AI do the rest.
home.coming_soon: Coming soon: Photo assessment for accidents!

about.about_text: Explore the world of used car pricing with Thammenha. Simple, user-friendly, and insightful – we make estimating your car's value easy and accurate.

goal.about_text: At Thammenha, we are on a mission to transform how you understand used car values. We strive to deliver exceptional accuracy and insights, making the process of evaluating your car’s worth simple and reliable.
